name: Caramel and Friends
description:
The goal is to catch the most amount of flies in 100 seconds. You need to avoid contact with bees. After bee bites your energy goes down to 0%.
Every jump decreases energy by 5%. If you want to have full energy, you must go to the second room on the right side. You can choose color of the cat. Round button is for approving your choose and for jumping. You can choose Polish or English language.
